text: Umbanda is the only 100% Brazilian religion. It mixes Candomblé, Kardecism as well as Roman Catholicism. It was created by the native people of Brazil as well as Africans who were slaves or ex - slaves, had the intention of using medicine herbs to cure people with rituaslistic sessions. Category:Religion in Brazil Category:Afro-American religion Category:Niterói
title: Umbanda
